title: The Spruce Gum Box
description: A family forged by adversity. A community united by dreams. With a bounty on his head, Jed turns to the one man he could trust; a nearby Micmac settlement leader. As the strife escalates over the border of Maine and the rights to its lucrative lumber industry, the unlikely partnership defies all odds to protect Jed's son, overcoming bigotry, betrayal, and the unforgiving 1820â€™s Maine wilderness.
author: Elizabeth Egerton Wilder
